history.text: HELLO
Have you seen this movie? I have not
OH wait.. Yes I have.  I was thinking something else.
Hi, it looks interesting, doesn't it?
It is a good movie
robert downey jr is very good in this movie
What do you like most about it?
I like the story line the most i think
have you seen it?
The special effects are pretty good
Yes, but a long time ago.
The ratings on the movie are pretty good too!
Yes, and there is a lot of tension between characters.
it's also been a while for me.  I think when it first came out i seen it and that was probably the last time
yes, very true.
i dont thinnk i like the sequels too much- but that's usually the way that goes for movies
Which of the characters do you love most?
i would have to say robert downey in this movie
the critical response is a bit confusing on this document- calling the movie depressing
the rest of the comments are good about the effects, and the other things.   I dont think i would call the movie depressing tho.
Maybe too deep for a superhero movie, don't you think? Like a Ridley scott movie.
possibly. it's different then other super heroes movies--- however i think the hulk movie was about the same tho
Wow, what about the technical stuff?
seems pretty good in that respect
I like fiction movies featuring engineers, they seem nerdy in the beggining but they end up saving the day!
I'm not a big fan of gwneth paltrow in this movie
that is true about the engineer types lol
it's hard to believe this movie is 10 years old now
doesn't seem like it at all.
Why don't you like gwyneth in this role?
She is boring to me.  i'm not even sure i like her in any of the movies. i think i just dont like her much
Not being the movie heroine or hero hurts a little bit.
true- its been a while since i seen this but i honestly cant remember much about her in the movie. just that she was there lol
That genre "military thriller" sounds both intriguing and interesting.
it does. that genre is very interesting ring to it
i remember the part where they took over downey's "home" and rampaged it.
and shockingly the end where he admits to being the superhero-   i dont recall any other super hero doing that revealing their identity
yes... a reason to watch it again. I might have forgotten some of the scenes and the ficticious countries in there, like Gulmira, shown along with Afganistan, a real country.
i can't recall what happened in the 2nd film after he told the people who he was
yes same here- i am only recalling bits and pieces
i think we even have these dvds (my 12 year old loves this series)
he would be happy if i said lets watch this today LOL
Ha ha, and by the way  i even haven't seen the sequel.....That sounds good for an Iron man marathon
maybe this weekend
true.  good thing to do on a holiday weekend- watch movies!!
i think we might do that as well!
good luck!

uid2response.feedback: The conversation was as dynamic as the subject movie Lol
